original_title: 2022 A/L results to be released in August
original_body_lines: The Commissioner General of Examinations Amith Jayasundara says that they are expecting to release the results of the 2022 (2023) G.C.E Advanced Level examination in August.
Joining a press briefing held today (May 30), Mr. Jayasundara stated that provisions required to release the relevant results immediately without any delays are already underway.
